name: COPING WITH LOSS
description:
Enjoy this small platformer focused on storytelling. The story line is about moving forward after a heavy loss.

* Project made for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam with the theme DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

-- Credits --

The lively color palette ENDESGA64 by ENDESGA available at https://lospec.com/palette-list/endesga-64

Everything else done by me, Eduardo D. Barbetta.

-- Tools used --

Unreal Engine 5;

MagicaVoxel;

Krita;

rFXGen;

-- Special Thanks  --

_itzdavidb and Joey Alice
